participant_1.background:
I love to listen to rap music on YouTube and read about my favorite charities on their websites.
My family and friends are my favorite people.
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
My beard is a part of my personality, and I love antiques.
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.

participant_2.background:
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
i have a harsh inner critic.
i like fantasizing.
I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.
I can't be a sniper in the army if I'm blind.

content.text: Hey, what are you up to?
I'm listening to rap music on YouTube. What are you up to?
I'm reading about my favorite charities. What's your favorite song?
I like listening to rap music from the 90s. My favorite song is 'Still D.R.E.' by Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg.
I love that song! It's a classic. What's your favorite charity?

My favorite charity is the National Breast Cancer Foundation. My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer when I was young, and she fought hard and beat it. I'm so grateful to the Foundation for all the support they provided to my family during that time.

I'm so sorry to hear that your mom had breast cancer. It's a terrible disease. I'm glad she was able to beat it. The National Breast Cancer Foundation is a great charity. I've donated to them in the past.
That's so kind of you. I'm sure your donation will help a lot of people.
